thread.title: Durant scores 13 as Thunder beat Fenerbahce Ulker 111-81
thread.title_full: Durant scores 13 as Thunder beat Fenerbahce Ulker 111-81

title: Durant scores 13 as Thunder beat Fenerbahce Ulker 111-81
text:
Durant scores 13 as Thunder beat Turkey's Fenerbahce Ulker 111-81 in preseason contest By CLIFF BRUNT AP Sports Writer   10:33   10:34   
People: 
Oklahoma (553) 

OKLAHOMA CITY â€” Kevin Durant scored 13 points in his first home game since February, and the Oklahoma City Thunder beat Fenerbahce Ulker (Turkey) 111-81 in preseason action Friday night. 
Durant, who missed most of last season with a broken right foot, was 6-of-10 shooting with five assists and four rebounds in 22 minutes. 
THUNDER: Steven Adams started at center after sitting out the preseason opener at Minnesota with minor back soreness. He finished with 10 points and eight rebounds in 22 minutes. ... Enes Kanter, who started the preseason opener at center, had 11 points and seven rebounds in 19 minutes. 
STAR WATCH: Thunder guard Russell Westbrook had 16 points, five assists and three steals in 22 minutes. 
MIDSEASON FORM: Oklahoma City's Dion Waiters hit a 3-pointer as time expired in the first half. He led the team with 19 points. 
UP NEXT: Oklahoma City plays Dallas on Tuesday night in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
